00018 // provide testCase, name
00019 TEST(BasicTests, ConstantBasic) {
00020 
00021 
00022     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00023 
00024     Constant a(sys); 
00025 
00026     EXPECT_EQ(a.getName(), "Constant");
00027 
00028 
00029     // set parameter by parameter name value
00030     a.setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 2.5);
00031 
00032     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0), 2.5);
00033     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.5), 2.5);
00034     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSample(0.55), 2.5);
00035  
00036 
00037     // set a different value
00038     a.setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 300);
00039     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0), 300);
00040 
00041 
00042 }

00047 
00048     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00049 
00050     Constant *gen1 = new Constant(sys); // create a constant generator
00051     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 300);

00053

00061 TEST(BasicTests, ConstantValidParameters) {
00062 
00063     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00064     Constant gen1(sys); 
00065 
00066     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameMaximum), false);
00067     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameMinimum), false);
00068     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameRefresh), false);
00069     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameRate), false);
00070 
00071     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameValue), true);
00072 
00073     // a bad argument for this generator will throw an exception
00074     ASSERT_THROW(gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, .4,
00075         aw::pContextNamePeriodSamples), std::invalid_argument);
00076     
00077 }

00081 TEST(BasicTests, ConstantParameterString) {
00082 
00083     //System sys;
00084     // set sampling rate to 1 for testing
00085     SystemPtr sys(new System());
00086     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00087 
00088 
00089     //GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create(aw::gNameConstant);
00090     Constant *gen1 = new Constant(sys); // create a constant generator
00091 
00092     // this depends on defaults
00093     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getParameterString(), "Constant{0}");
00094 
00095     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 220);
00096     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getValueAtSecond(0.0), 220);
00097 
00098     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getParameterString(), "Constant{220}");
00099 
00100 
00101 
00102 
00103     // try doing the same with GeneratorFactory
00104     GeneratorPtr gen2 = gf.create(aw::gNameConstant);
00105 
00106     // this depends on defaults
00107     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getParameterString(), "Constant{0}");
00108     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 220);
00109     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getValueAtSecond(0.0), 220);
00110     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getParameterString(), "Constant{220}");
00111 
00112 }
